predicate.note: Frames file for 'rename' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'name'.

roleset.name: to give a new name to

example.name: passive
example.text: The unit will be renamed [*-2] Comair Aviation Academy and will continue [*-2] to be headed [*-1] by Scott Williams , a son of its founder , Comair said [0] [*T*-3] .

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Before they let him go he added a thousand bureaucrats to the RDF in Tampa and renamed it Central Command .
